response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and innovation. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $850,000. I believe this is an exceptional value considering its rarity and the benefits it offers. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or make an offer. I am open to negotiation and look forward to potentially sharing this remarkable product with someone who appreciates its true worth.", "product_price": 850000}
